original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo tattheva rājagahe vassaṁ vasanti, tattha hemantaṁ, tattha gimhaṁ.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ tattha iva rājagahe vassam vasanti tattha hemanta tattha gimha

original: “āhundarikā bhikkhunīnaṁ disā andhakārā, na imāsaṁ disā pakkhāyantī”ti.
analyzed: āhundarikāḥ bhikkhunīnam disāḥ andhakārāḥ na imāsam disā pakkhāyanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe dhammim katham katvā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca—
analyzed: tena hi bhikkhave bhikkhunīnam sikkhāpadam paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṁvuṭṭhā cārikaṁ na pakkameyya antamaso chappañcayojanānipi, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī vassa vuṭṭhā cārikam na pakkameyya antamasaḥ chappañcayojanāni pi pācittiyanti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: purimaṁ vā temāsaṁ pacchimaṁ vā temāsaṁ vuṭṭhā.
analyzed: purimam vā temāsam pacchimam vā temāsam vuṭṭhā

original: “Cārikaṁ na pakkamissāmi antamaso chappañcayojanānipī”ti dhuraṁ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: cārikam na pakkamissāmi antamasaḥ cha pañca yojanāni pi iti dhuram nikkhitta matte āpatti pācittiyassa
